node.title: 'Vaccination surges' lift three remote NT communities to 100 per cent first-dose rates
node.alt: The NT Health COVID-19 rapid response team assessing the locked down community of Rockhole on the outskirts of Katherine.
node.description: As the Northern Territory battles its first remote COVID-19 outbreak, authorities say the "vaccination surges" they are undertaking across communities that are under threat are the difference between life and death.
node.content:
["Since the start of the pandemic, Territorians were told it was a question of when, not if, COVID-19 would spread into a remote Aboriginal community.", "Early last week, the nightmare scenario finally materialised, when Robinson River became the first to face a COVID-19 outbreak.", "Just days earlier, Chief Minister Michael Gunner had released his\u00a0government's updated plan for managing clusters among remote and vulnerable residents.", "\"The most important public health measure you can do if you get a COVID case in a remote community is to rush to that community with the vaccine,\" he said.", "He based his rationale on modelling by the Doherty Institute that showed \"vaccination surges\" would significantly decrease the risk, particularly in places where the majority of residents were yet to be inoculated.", "\"If you get a COVID case in a remote community and you do a vaccination surge in that community, you will reduce \u2014 halve \u2014 the risk of hospitalisation in the community and, therefore, deaths.\"", "The total number of cases in the ongoing\u00a0outbreak\u00a0stands at 40.", "
First 'surges' in remote communities
", "", "
The NT Health teams have been sent to Katherine, Robinson River, Binjari and Rockhole in the past week.(Supplied: NT Health)
", "As soon as the first case was confirmed in Robinson River, an eight-person \"rapid assessment team\" was flown more than 1,000 kilometres south-east of Darwin to test residents and vaccinate those who wanted the jab.", "The community was already one of the most inoculated in the Territory.", "", "
Extra health staff have been\u00a0sent into remote communities following outbreaks\u00a0to increase vaccination rates.(Supplied: NT Health)
", "But its first-dose rate of 87 per cent quickly shot up to 100 per cent, thanks to the surge.", "Days later, rapid assessment teams were deployed again \u2014 this time to Binjari and Rockhole, on the outskirts of Katherine.", "", "
Police and health teams were first\u00a0sent to the communities of Binjari and Rockhole after a positive wastewater test.(ABC News: Michael Franchi)
", "But vaccination rates in those two communities were dangerously low.", "The Territory government has not released exact rates, except to say they were below 70 per cent.", "", "
NT Health staff have contended with searing heat, and local animals, during their testing and vaccination efforts.(Supplied: NT Health)
", "However, after several days, health teams in full personal protective equipment, working in temperatures of almost 40-degrees Celsius, have helped change the prognosis for residents.", "Mr Gunner yesterday said the vaccination surge saw Binjari and Rockhole, as well as the nearby Warlpiri community, reach a 100 per cent first-dose vaccination rate.", "\"Obviously, you prefer to vaccinate people in advance, but a reactive vaccine response is critical to reducing hospitalisations,\" Mr Gunner said yesterday.", "\"So we've done everything we can.", "\"I thank everyone\u00a0in those communities for putting their hand up to be vaccinated.\"", "Robinson River community leader Dickie Dixon\u00a0praised the engagement of health teams during the outbreak.", "\"Please show respect for my people and my community and also the team that worked through this process,\" he said\u00a0in a video posted on Facebook by Northern Territory\u00a0Senator Malarndirri McCarthy.", "\"These guys didn't hesitate and stay outside, they came in and worked with the community and worked through this.", "\"These teams that are going to be coming around in your area, which is infected now, support them.\"", "
Residents uprooted from community
", "", "
Cases and close contacts\u00a0from Binjari were the first transported to\u00a0Darwin on Saturday night.(ABC News: Michael Franchi)
", "Another element of the containment strategy has been the evacuation of at-risk people out of remote communities, whose overcrowded homes can lead to rapid spread of the virus.", "", "
The Binjari community is about 330 kilomtres south of Darwin.(ABC News: Michael Franchi)
", "During the current outbreak in Binjari, more than 30 positive cases and close contacts, in a community of about 200 people, have been transported to the Howard Springs quarantine centre near Darwin.", "\"Wherever we've got [residences with] overcrowding, or where it's just simply not a case where an individual can have access to their own ablutions for example \u2026 it does create a limited pool for those to be able to quarantine without going to [Howard Springs],\" Police Commissioner Jamie Chalker said.", "Even more people from Binjari are likely to be moved to Howard Springs after another case linked to the community was recorded yesterday, he said.", "\"That is the model we will continue so that we can get the [communities] out of these arrangements sooner rather than later.\"", "", "
Going overseas? Here's what you need to know
"]
